code: const sgMail=require("@sendgrid/mail");sgMail.setApiKey(process.env.SENDGRID_API_KEY);const sendEmail=()=>{const msg={to:"mikolaj.lesniczuk@gmail.com",from:"alpimix.kontakt@gmail.com",subject:"Sending with SendGrid is Fun",text:"and easy to do anywhere, even with Node.js",html:"and easy to do anywhere, even with Node.js"};return sgMail.send(msg);};module.exports={sendEmail};
